definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: I think it depends what they're offered, ' said Lupin .
sentences.chinese: “我想這取決於他們會得到什麼好處，”盧平說。

sentences.english: Many people overestimate the benefits of vitamin C and other antioxidants.
sentences.chinese: 許多人高估了維C和其它抗氧化劑的好處。

sentences.english: And all of this, of course, ignores the benefits of limiting global warming.
sentences.chinese: 而所有這一切都忽略了遏制全球變暖所帶來的好處。

sentences.english: A half-written ebook is no good to anyone.
sentences.chinese: 寫到一半的書對誰都沒有好處。

sentences.english: The advantage of Microsoft's method is that it works better for on-screen reading.
sentences.chinese: 微軟的做法的好處在於它更利於屏幕閱讀。

sentences.english: He enumerated to me the advantages of traveling by train .
sentences.chinese: 他爲我一一舉出搭火車旅行的好處。

sentences.english: What is good with personal loan is that it does not require credit checks.
sentences.chinese: 小金額個人貨物款的一個好處是它不需要確認信用度。

sentences.english: He says this will help the industry, but not enough.
sentences.chinese: 他說，油價下降對航空業有好處，但這並不夠。

sentences.english: I guess there are advantages toshavingstwo big buckteeth. It always looks like he's smiling.
sentences.chinese: 長着這種門牙有一個好處，讓人感覺他老是在微微笑。

sentences.english: These small businesses have benefited greatly from the fall in interest rates.
sentences.chinese: 小企業應利率下降而獲得了很年夜的好處。

sentences.english: Upward revaluation of currency is sometimes disbenefit to our company.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣升值有時候對我們的公司沒有好處。

sentences.english: For nourishing the there are a lot of benefits.
sentences.chinese: 對滋補身體是有很大的好處的哈。

sentences.english: From this perspective, design patterns have much to offer.
sentences.chinese: 從這一點來講，設計模式可以提供很多好處。

sentences.english: Yes, for all the good that it does us.
sentences.chinese: 是的，這就是它能夠給我們的全部好處了。
難道你沒發現奉承拍馬很有好處？

sentences.english: Best of the sport is to do the deed, or shout nothing.
sentences.chinese: 體育運動的好處是隻在乎行動而否則說空話。

definition: to be capable of/to be able to/can
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
